title: whitePumah COACH!
body:
Are you a player wanting to get to challanger?
Are you wanting to get to a higher elo?
Well, I have an offer for you all today!
I'm giving you the chance to have one on one sessions with a experienced and knowledgeable LoL player. Some of you may know him as 'whitePumah'.
He is currently Bronze III in rank, I couldn't believe it when he told me! I am currently Bronze V, and with his coaching tips, he has gained me 50LP!
I couldn't believe it, I simply thought I was dreaming when he offered to coach me. Although he charges $10.00 an hour, he promised to get me challanger within two years!

I would defiantly recommend this guy to anyone, he simply is a class player.

Regards,
Bronze V ZOBMOJ.

replies.body:
I got to challenger just from hearing about this.

GG.
wow i too had a experience that was similar but then in my dream i saw a figure of a zen master from shag hia... Im like going through a ultimate experience like never before.
haha this is such a joke a season 4 silver and a currently bronze 2 think he can make challenger and win everygame in 200 games? haha what a fcking joke lol

I went from silver to platinum in under 20 games on the NA server.

So clearly I know what I am talking about.
Lets see this imaginary account then, cause that is impossible.

After one month of playing, I am pleased to announce that I ranked up my account from Bronze V to Bronze III. I have high hopes for the future, maybe you will see me on the OPL someday! WhitePumah is a world class coach, better than the pros in NA LSC he says! I am truly privileged to have him as a mentor.

whitePumah, you're such a joke. I'm cool with theory-crafting and everything, but you act as if everything you do is the magnum opus of building and of gameplay. If you were actually that good, you wouldn't be platinum on NA and you'd be higher.

I know I am not perfect I make plenty of mistake in game and I can see them. However what I do is currently without a doubt blatantly obviously more advanced than what is currently going around at the moment. It isn't the best thing possible or anything like that. it is just the next big step the meta should be turning towards. Then games will become a lot more interesting in terms of strategy.

Actually would only take about 200 games to get to challenger from bronze if you followed it correctly.

Enjoy platinum I guess.

Followed it correctly? You've played just under 200 ranked games this season and still in Bronze!
If it's not achievable for you, how will it be for me!@
Because it requires a duo who both know exactly how the game works and are able to exploit that fact.
If I up the rate to $20.00 will I be more successful?

I am not sure you seem to apply that kind of logic to your gameplay.

The several games I personally carried the entire game for you as adc and yet you still think that as the annie support you should be taking the farm and kills over me. On the account you were boosting for money (or so you told me) I was carrying you so technically I was the one making YOU money.
